roleset.name: surgery that diverts part of the ileum to an artificial opening in the abdominal wall

role.descr: which part(s) of the ileum is used

example.text: Mr. Knopp underwent an end ileostomy for a rectal cancer.
example.amr: (i2 / ileostomy-01 :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Mr." :op2 "Knopp")) :ARG2 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n3 / name :op1 "end")) :ARG1-of (c / cause-01 :ARG0 (c2 / cancer-03 :ARG1 p :ARG2 (a / anatomical-site :primary + :name (n2 / name :op1 "rectum")))))
